name: Ganesha
description: Aartis devoted to Vighnaharta for auspicious beginnings.

description: Aartis honoring Shri Vishnu and his avatars.

description: Hymns for Mahadev and the cosmic dance.

description: Prayers to the Divine Mother in her many forms.

description: Bhajans celebrating Shri Krishna and his leelas.

description: Aartis for devotion, strength, and protection.
